value_claims.claim_title: CSO Assistant reduces call handling time by up to 20%
value_claims.claim_description: DBS Bank's GenAI-powered CSO Assistant reduces call handling time by up to 20% by transcribing customer queries in real-time, retrieving relevant information instantly, and assisting with documentation.
value_claims.source_quote: When fully deployed, it is expected to reduce call handling time by up to 20%.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The reduction in call handling time is directly attributed to the CSO Assistant's capabilities: real-time transcription, instant information retrieval, and documentation assistance.

value_claims.claim_title: CSO Assistant achieves nearly 100% transcription accuracy
value_claims.claim_description: During the pilot phase, DBS Bank's CSO Assistant achieved transcription accuracy of nearly 100%, enabling customer service officers to assist customers more effectively.
value_claims.source_quote: based on the data it collected during the pilot, it found that the tool has been able to achieve a transcription accuracy of nearly 100%.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The transcription accuracy is directly measured as an outcome of the CSO Assistant's speech recognition and LLM capabilities.

value_claims.claim_title: 90% of CSOs report positive impact on workflow from CSO Assistant
value_claims.claim_description: Close to 90% of customer service officers involved in the pilot reported that the CSO Assistant had a positive impact on their workflow and expressed confidence in leveraging it long-term.
value_claims.source_quote: Close to 90% of CSOs involved in the pilot reported that the virtual assistant had a positive impact on their workflow and expressed confidence in leveraging it in the longer term.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The positive workflow impact is directly attributed to CSO Assistant usage, as reported by users during the pilot phase.

value_claims.claim_title: AI platform reduces time-to-market from 15 months to under 3 months
value_claims.claim_description: DBS' implementations of a centralized data platform and protocol repository have reduced the time-to-market for AI initiatives from 15 months to just under three months.
value_claims.source_quote: DBS' implementations of a data platform and protocol repository have reduced the time-to-market for AI initiatives from 15 months to just under three months.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The time-to-market reduction is directly attributed to the AI data platform and protocol repository infrastructure enabling faster AI model development and deployment.

value_claims.claim_title: CSO Assistant eliminates repetitive tasks and frees up bandwidth
value_claims.claim_description: CSO Assistant has eliminated repetitive tasks and freed up bandwidth for customer service teams to engage customers more deeply and efficiently.
value_claims.source_quote: CSO Assistant has eliminated repetitive tasks and freed up bandwidth for her team to engage customers more deeply and efficiently.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The elimination of repetitive tasks is directly attributed to CSO Assistant's automation of transcription, information retrieval, and documentation tasks.

context_claims.claim_description: DBS first began experimenting with AI and machine learning in 2014, giving the bank an early head start in AI adoption.
context_claims.source_quote: DBS first began experimenting with AI and machine learning in 2014, giving the bank an early head start and garnering valuable insights

context_claims.claim_title: DBS deployed over 1,500 AI models across 370 use cases as of May 2025
context_claims.claim_description: As of May 2025, DBS has deployed over 1,500 AI models across 370 use cases throughout the organization.
context_claims.source_quote: As of May 2025, DBS has deployed over 1,500 AI models across 370 use cases.

context_claims.claim_title: 500 customer service officers to use CSO Assistant
context_claims.claim_description: Some 500 customer service officers at DBS Bank will be able to tap the CSO Assistant to improve workflows and better serve customers.
context_claims.source_quote: Some 500 customer service officers (CSOs) at Singapore's DBS Bank will soon be able to tap a generative AI (GenAI)-powered virtual assistant

context_claims.claim_title: CSO Assistant pilot started in October 2023
context_claims.claim_description: DBS started piloting the use of CSO Assistant in October 2023 before full deployment.
context_claims.source_quote: DBS started piloting the use of CSO Assistant in October 2023

context_claims.claim_title: DBS is Southeast Asia's biggest lender
context_claims.claim_description: DBS Bank is identified as Southeast Asia's biggest lender.
context_claims.source_quote: The bank, Southeast Asia's biggest lender

context_claims.claim_title: DBS operates in the banking and financial services sector
context_claims.claim_description: DBS Bank operates in the highly regulated financial services industry, specifically banking.
context_claims.source_quote: In the highly regulated financial industry, where sensitive data and AI decisions directly shape customers' finances

context_claims.claim_title: CSO Assistant supports customer service operations
context_claims.claim_description: The CSO Assistant is deployed to support customer service officers in handling customer queries and service requests.
context_claims.source_quote: Gen AI-powered tools like DBS' CSO Assistant can help customer service officers respond to queries more effectively.

context_claims.claim_title: DBS follows PURE principles for responsible AI
context_claims.claim_description: DBS follows four guiding principles for AI governance: purposeful, unsurprising, respectful, explainable (PURE) in its model data governance framework.
context_claims.source_quote: DBS follows four guiding principles – purposeful, unsurprising, respectful, explainable (PURE) – in its model data governance framework.

context_claims.claim_title: CSO Assistant built entirely in-house with tailored LLM
context_claims.claim_description: The CSO Assistant was built entirely in-house by DBS AI engineers, integrating a large language model tailored to local languages and parlance with voice telephony and speech recognition.
context_claims.source_quote: The virtual assistant, dubbed CSO Assistant, was built entirely in-house by the bank's AI engineers, integrating a large language model (LLM) tailored to local languages and parlance

context_claims.claim_description: DBS-GPT, an employee-facing version of ChatGPT for content generation and writing tasks, is currently available to more than 25,000 DBS employees.
context_claims.source_quote: It is currently available to more than 25,000 DBS employees.

context_claims.claim_title: DBS takes co-pilot approach with human-in-the-loop
context_claims.claim_description: DBS takes a co-pilot approach to using AI, ensuring there is always a human in the loop, with AI complementing rather than replacing human judgment.
context_claims.source_quote: DBS, for instance, takes a co-pilot approach to using AI, ensuring there is always a human in the loop.
